page.title: 04 CHALK CHURCH
page.content: Chalk Church is about 1000 years old. However,the inside of of the church has been greatly modernised. The church can hold about 250 people. There are three services each week which are attended by people from Chalk, Gravesend and Strood.The Church has a tower with three bells but the bells are no longer used. The Church has a flower festival every other year to raise money for the restoration of the Church. It is said that Charles Dickens attended the Church each Sunday and loved it there. The Church was mentioned in the original domesday book. It is a very attractive Church with many different fellowships for both old and young . These mostly take place in Chalk parish hall.
